title: Stolen Credentials Drive the Rise of Financially Motivated Cyberattacks

content.raw: Throughout the first half of 2025, the FortiGuard Incident Response team investigated dozens of security breaches across multiple industries driven by financially motivated threat actors. What emerged from these investigations was a striking pattern: attackers are abandoning complex, malware-heavy approaches in favor of a deceptively simple methodâ€”simply logging in using stolen credentials and leveraging legitimate […] The post Stolen Credentials Drive the Rise of Financially Motivated Cyberattacks appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
